name: channel_setByProgram
description: This function is used to change the channel of a smart home appliance or place by specifying the program name.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device or place which needs to be adjusted is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to adjust the channel.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment related to the device.

parameters.name: programName
parameters.description: The name of the program currently airing on the desired channel.
